title: Naphtali, or, The wrestlings of the Church of Scotland for the kingdom of Christ contained in a true and short deduction thereof, from the beginning of the reformation of religion, until the year 1667 : together with the last speeches and testimonies of some who have died for the truth since the year 1660 : whereunto are also subjoyned, a relation of the sufferings and death of Mr. Hew McKail ...
author: Stewart, James, Sir, 1635-1713.
notes: Joint authorship attributed to James Steuart and James Stirling. Cf. BM; Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
